blagues.question: Why don't skeletons fight each other?
What do you call fake spaghetti?
Why did the scarecrow win an award?
blagues.reponse: Because he was outstanding in his field.

blagues.question: What happens when you go to the bathroom in France?
Why don't eggs tell jokes?
Why did the bicycle fall over?
Why can't you give Elsa a balloon?
blagues.reponse: Because she will let it go.

blagues.question: What do you call a fish wearing a bowtie?
How does the ocean say hi?
What do you call cheese that isn't yours?
What did the grape do when he got stepped on?
blagues.reponse: Nothing but let out a little wine.

blagues.question: Why don't you play poker in the jungle?
What do you call an alligator in a vest?
Why don't some couples go to the gym?
blagues.reponse: Because some relationships don't work out.

blagues.question: What did one plate say to another?
What do you get when you cross a snowman and a vampire?
Why was the math book sad?
blagues.reponse: Because it had too many problems.

blagues.question: Why couldn't the leopard play hide and seek?
Why don't vampires attack Taylor Swift?
Why did the golfer bring two pairs of pants?
blagues.reponse: In case he got a hole in one.

blagues.question: What do you call a bear with no teeth?
What do you get when you cross a snake and a pie?
Why was Cinderella so bad at soccer?
blagues.reponse: She kept running away from the ball.

blagues.question: Why did the computer go to the doctor?
Why are frogs so happy?
blagues.reponse: Because they eat whatever bugs them.

blagues.question: Why can't you hear a pterodactyl in the bathroom?
What do you call an illegally parked frog?
Why did the tomato turn red?
blagues.reponse: Because it saw the salad dressing.

blagues.question: Why did the chicken join a band?
What do you call a cow with no legs?
How do you organize a space party?
What did the buffalo say to his son when he left for college?
Why don't seagulls fly over the bay?
blagues.reponse: Because then they would be called bagels.

blagues.question: What did the janitor say when he jumped out of the closet?
Why did the M&M go to school?
blagues.reponse: Because it wanted to be a Smartie.

blagues.question: Why don't sharks eat clowns?
Why can't you trust stairs?
blagues.reponse: Because they're always up to something.

blagues.question: Why don't ants get sick?
Why was the broom late?
Why are elevator jokes so good?
blagues.reponse: Because they work on many levels.

blagues.question: What kind of tree fits in your hand?
Why do cows have hooves instead of feet?
How does a penguin build its house?
What kind of shoes do ninjas wear?
What do you call a pile of cats?
Why are ghosts bad at lying?
Why did the banana go to the doctor?
Why don't oysters share their pearls?
Why do ducks make bad doctors?
blagues.reponse: Because they are always quacking up.

blagues.question: What do you call a sleeping bull?
How do you catch a squirrel?
blagues.reponse: Climb up in a tree and act like a nut.

blagues.question: Why was the belt arrested?
blagues.reponse: Because it was holding up a pair of pants.

blagues.question: Why did the calendar go to therapy?
blagues.reponse: Because it had too many dates.

blagues.question: Why was the music teacher arrested?
blagues.reponse: Because she had the wrong note.

blagues.question: What do you call a dinosaur with a great vocabulary?
Why was the soccer player arrested?
Why don’t crabs give to charity?

blagues.reponse: Because they know how to spin.

blagues.reponse: Because she will let it go.
